评论详情: I was gifted a pair of these in brown and loved them so much I ordered them in black as well. My brown ones are an XL and my black ones are a L. I generally wear a 12/14 in jeans and both fit great. The brown ones need a belt, but they are so comfy!
I bought another color, because these pants are stylish and very comfortable.  I gave 4 stars, because the black color attracts too much lint.
These are so comfortable and fashionable. They can be dressed up or down.

They are so comfortable. I love the fabric. The length is pretty good for a semi tall person 5'8. I like the little zipper things, and makes them. look kind of "edgy". I also like that there's elastic in the back. It's me perfectly. XL.  Planning on buying another pair in a different color.
I used the sizing guide, but the pants were tight. I like my pants to be loose and comfortable. So, either the sizing chart is a bit small or these are tight fitting pants.

Bought these in blue/grey size Large.  I'm 5'5, around 165 lbs and thick around the middle and thighs.  I probably will try size medium if I order more. These wash without too many wrinkles, feel soft and fit well. The cargo pockets are real and I appreciate that in these essentially "fashion" pants. I mostly wear them for my active, sometimes dusty, customer facing job. My only complaint is that I've marred the look of the fabric in a couple places. I tried to use regular hand soap to pretreat a mark from pen ink. The grey color of the fabric started to lighten, as though the dye wasn't completely fixed.  I stopped scrubbing and just let the stain and mark slowly blend and fade with more washing.  Luckily a small stain won't be a big deal, but unfortunately I predict these pants will enter the "too warn looking for work" phase sooner than my less stylish but tougher Dickies cargo pants. Still, I like the look and feel of these a lot and will probably replace this pair when they wear out and/or buy more colors.
Love these they're super cute and comfy and fit good

Love these pants, so comfortable. And fits my 5'3" height perfectly. Only complaint was the elastic in hems to cuff if want, the toggles and extra elastic stuck out and dragged on ground. Ended up just cutting out as have no plans to tighten the cuffs.
Excellent pair of pants that just didn’t fit the way I had hoped on me… Worth trying if you’re a fan of cargo pants!
These are very nicely made. If you like them baggy, you should size up one size. Very cute and modern pants.
Great material.  Size is right on
I was shocked that the pants came in a zip lock bag w label ??!!! Bag 1/2 open???

Totally love these pants! The fit is nice and the length is perfect. As for sizing, the waist is strechable so in that fact you may wanna downsize. Just for reference I’m 153lb, 5’5. I had bought an 8 and they fit perfect. Hope this review helps.❤️

These are really nice, love all the pockets.

I am usually leery to order pants online but I thought I would take a chance on these. I travel by air several times a year so I wanted pants with a lot of pockets so I could store items rather than carry a big purse. These pants fit the bill. Pockets are plentiful and deep. Also gives me hands free so I can chase the grand kids around without the burden of a purse. I am 5’2” and the adjustable ankle band gives me the latitude I need so I did not have to hem the pants. Totally great buy.
these fit my daughter very well.  We have had no problems with the zipper as I have seen other reviews complain about it

The pants are cute, but the zipper broke after wearing approximately five times. So disappointed.
Comfortable pants and had compliments on them however, the zipper mechanism broke off day 1

I’ve had these pants for about a month and a half. At first I loved them. They are super comfortable, and I liked the extra pockets. After wearing them a few weeks, I noticed that the material started piling between my legs. Then a week or two later, the zipper broke. I fixed the zipper, but then the zipper started pulling apart in the middle. Of course now, I can’t return them. Super disappointed!

First of all, I want to say I LOVE these pants and had received compliments from other women at work. Also, I gotten compliments from my bf, saying they make my butt look good.  Now the cons. The only con I have is that the zipper is super cheap! I have been wearing these pants (I bought 2) for almost a month now and this week, the zipper broke. I tried to fix it but it's impossible. This is so frustrating.  Do NOT buy until they change the zipper. Now I have 2 pairs of pants that I cant wear because the zippers are broken. Don't get attached to these pants because you'll be heart broken that the zipper is so cheap that it breaks so easily. Not worth it.
I hate buying clothes, especially pants. These however are amazing! They fit great. If you're on the fence, go for it! You won't be disappointed
Great fit and value. Highly recommend using the measurement guide for fit. She loves all the pockets and how the material feels.

I took these pants out of the packaging and I swear I thought I had been sent the wrong size. They looked so small. Nope! Ordered a large, and received a large. I am 5 ft 4 and about 180 lbs. These pants are very comfortable and stretchy!
This is my favourite pant now on the basis of comfortness. Material is also good. A drawback is it fades fast. I bought it 2 months back and it has already faded.
They were very comfortable

评论概述: No gap in the waist; short length
评论详情: These pants are a perfect fit. I'm a pear shape; 5'4" and a comfortable sz. 12.  A large was a perfect fit. However, the length doesn't give long enough. It came right below my ankle. Too short if you want the length in the model has.

These pants are very comfortable and soft. Fit perfectly I got a small and I am 5ft 110 lbs. the only thing I find weird is the 2 front knee pockets don’t have any kind of closure. I bought 2 pair and would buy more. I wash them and no shrinkage at all. As with other reviewers the zipper can be a nightmare to get up and down. I hope it doesn’t break cause I really like these pants.
This product ran small

Loved the pants, wore them on a trip. Super he made he made it comfortable. Came home washed them shrank by over an inch so now too short to wear. I look for easy care in casual attire, and hand washing and ironing is not part of it.

I love the carpenter pants / hip hop pants look with the wide leg but slim waist. These pants really deliver. They look nice enough that I was able to wear them to a fancy luncheon with a blouse.  They are a little long, but you can wear there a little higher on the waist (which feels a little weird). But it works because of the elastic waistband. There is also a cinch around the cuff that might be able to be adjusted so that the cuffs don't drag. I recommend wearing these with platform high-tops.  The only negative is that they do pick up cat hair, but it's not horrible. I just try to avoid sitting down until I leave the house in the morning, haha.  I will be buying more of these.
Very comfortable love the style.
Great pants, but as everyone has commented, defective zippers.  Two pairs now.  One zipper replaced by Mom - thanks. The style, fit and pockets are just what I want.
Size up because it is tight around your waist and they sit very high up. But fit cute elsewhere
Bought this for my wife. She said they are very comfortable and have deep pockets. But the zipper doesn't last long. This are the pants I buy and still have issues with the zipper.

I ordered two pair of these cargo pants in size medium. The pink/purple fit like a glove! These were either sized incorrectly or not made by same standards. They were about a 1/2- 1” different in the waist and hip area. The legs were at least 1 1/2” shorter than the others. They were returned without any issues.

评论概述: They fit really well, it’s a little long in her but she’s 4’11”
评论详情: Got these for my sister. She’d love cargo style. They fit really well, it’s a little long in her but she’s 4’11”  lol. The material is well made and comfy. Has done stretch to it.

Love the blue grey color, and the pockets are nice. They were a little long on me (5'3", 139 lb), but the biggest problem was that the waist was too tight. I've always been more of a block figure (no curves), so often when the hips fit, the waist was too small, and if the waist fit, the hips and legs were way too baggy. I was hoping with the elastic waist, it would work out as some others with this elastic waistband style were comfy for me. Unfortunately, these pants were too tight at the waist to be comfortable. They are really cute, and I like the slight flare/boot cut at the bottom. If you have a small waist, these would be great. Note, it is super high waisted. I ordered a medium. I think the large world be too baggy at the hips and legs, so I'm just returning them instead of sizing up.
I am in love with these pants. Great mix of structure and comfortable material/fit. I'm going to buy more.
Fits great.
These pants were just what I was looking for.  I love the extra pockets.
Love love these pants ordering another pair Fit and comfort are best qualities
Super comfortable and cute!

I love these pants! They are so comfy! I wear them camping, at home and to work; very versatile.  I only have one complaint and that is that they only lasted 5 months. I purchased in March, and the zipper already broke. This should not have happened with the regular wash cycles, to me that speaks to poor quality. Nice fit and quality

I absolutely loved these pants.  They are my second pair (different color).  They are soft and comfortable but look a bit nicer than jeans.  The issue -- I have had them barely a month and was wearing them for the second time.  I thought my zipper had slipped down, but when I looked, I realized that the zipper actually came apart.  As you can see from the picture, the one side somehow pulled out of the mechanism, rendering the pants useless.  Because of the length of time (one month), I am unable to return.  What a waste of money.  This makes me sad as I really liked the pants.  They were obviously a defective pair, as my other pair is just fine, and I've had them longer.

评论概述: Comfortable but Different material than Expected
评论详情: The material is like yoga pants but only slightly thicker/tougher. I was expecting a bit sturdier like canvas type material but they are really soft and comfortable like thin sweats almost. I am 5'3", 125-130lbs, weight mostly in my butt/thighs, measurement circumference butt 39", thighs 24", low waist/hips 32". I got a small which fits pretty good. I actually wanted them a bit baggier as they were pretty skin tight around my butt but you can stretch the material pretty easy then it was more comfortable. The length is slightly past my heel which is perfect and the legs are baggy which I was hoping for.  Also these pants have an awesome stretchy waist and are very snug without a belt, despite having enough room for my butt, its rare to find something with a shape meant for curvier butts and smaller waists! Many large pockets!
Poor quality. Zipper broke after 1 month. Do not buy
